choices.D: List of activities affected, list of potential risk responses, list of causes
choices.C: Short risk titles, list of potential risk owners, list of impacts on objectives
choices.A: List of identified risks, potential risk owners, list of potential risk response
choices.B: List of identified risks, list of causes, list of risk categories

questions.question_text: Which of the following must be included in the risk register when the project manager completes the Identify Risks process?

discussion.content: A-List of identified risks, Potential risk owners, and potential risk responses 11.2.3.1

questions.question_text: What is a tool or technique used in the Control Quality process?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Statistical sampling

Statistical sampling is a tool or technique used in the Control Quality process. This technique involves selecting a subset of items or data from a larger population and using statistical methods to analyze and draw conclusions about the quality or characteristics of the entire population. It helps in assessing the quality of project deliverables by examining a representative sample of the work to identify defects, errors, or deviations from the quality standards.

Statistical sampling is commonly used to make informed decisions about whether the project work meets the required quality criteria and whether corrective actions are necessary to address any identified quality issues.

Brainstorming is a group technique that encourages the generation of multiple ideas or solutions to a problem in a short period of time. It involves the free-flowing expression of ideas without criticism or judgment.

questions.question_text: A project manager held a meeting and listed all the team members' ideas for improving the product on a white board. What data gathering technique did the project manager apply?

choices.A: Hold a face-to-face meeting with the project manager and warn them
choices.D: Ask the project manager to update the monthly status report distribution list
choices.C: Invite stakeholders to attend monthly progress review meetings
choices.B: Point the director to a link where they can take a look at the reports
